name: Magical Understudy
summary: Your eidolon evolves to cast spells.
description:
Your eidolon evolves to cast spells. It gains the Cast a Spell activity and learns two cantrips of its tradition, which it can cast as innate spells.Magical Understudy Leads To...

Magical Adept, Share Eidolon MagicTraitsEvolution: Feats with this trait affect your eidolon instead of you, typically by granting it additional physical capabilities.
